body:
Huggybaby @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=3736&p=100223#p102274 When playing precon decks, add title of decks somewhere, probably on top of the playfield in the white bar that says "Magarena by ubeefx".

eg. Player 1: Blue/Green aggro vs. Player 2: Red/Blue Loser
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Add title of deck to top of playing field
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on November 22, 2012 20:16:06_

Huggybaby @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=3736&p=100223#p102274 When playing precon decks, add title of decks somewhere, probably on top of the playfield in the white bar that says "Magarena by ubeefx".

eg. Player 1: Blue/Green aggro vs. Player 2: Red/Blue Loser

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=306_
